pkgmetadata.longdescription: # rtsp-to-webrtc-clientPython client library for [RTSPtoWeb](https://github.com/deepch/RTSPtoWeb) and [RTSPtoWebRTC](https://github.com/deepch/RTSPtoWebRTC).## Development```$ python3 -m venv venv$ source venv/bin/activate$ pip3 install -e .$ pip3 install -r requirements.txt# Running tests$ pytest# Formatting and linting$ pre-commit run --all-files```
